overview: a story of an orthopedic surgeon from Agami and how his close relationship to the sea , philosophy of life , firm principles and passion for woodwork led him to rediscover his true potential away from what most societies call success routes . On his journey he encounters kindred spirits who flock together in pursuit of happiness , freedom and self - expression .
tagline: a story of an orthopedic surgeon from Agami and how his close relationship to the sea , philosophy of life
title: رحالة
